Commands.Freeze Joker: Group magic BRV attackTarget: 2 turns Freeze (halts BRV gain)
Commands.Red Card: 9-hit ranged BRV attackSelf: 2 turns MAX BRV Up I
Commands.Prismatic Flash: usable when EX gauge is filled

Artifacts.BRV Guard Up: Raises Defense Power by 10% when BRV is over 50% Max BRV.
Artifacts.All In Boost: Increases the effects of All In by 5%.
Artifacts.Mighty Freeze Joker: Raises BRV Damage dealt by Freeze Joker by 10%.
Artifacts.Mighty Red Card: Raises BRV Damage dealt by Red Card by 10%.

Passives.Freeze Joker Light: Slightly reduces action delay after using 「Freeze Joker」
Passives.Bonus Up All: Slightly raises Break Bonus gained by the party after breaking an enemy
Passives.Freeze Joker BRV Gain: Gains a small amount of BRV after using 「Freeze Joker」
Passives.Red Card Power: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt with 「Red Card」
Passives.Break Speed Up: Slightly raises Speed for 1 turn after breaking an enemy
Passives.Red Card Light: Slightly reduces action delay after using 「Red Card」
Passives.Critical BRV Gain: Grants a small amount of BRV after inflicting a critical hit
Passives.Danger Attack Up: Slightly raises Attack when HP is under 20%
Passives.All In: Moderately raises Initial BRV, Max BRV, Attack, Defense and Speed when there are no ability uses left.
